name: Backrooms Awakening
description:
Backrooms Awakening is a fan game of the popular creepy pasta Backrooms

The Backrooms is an urban legend and creepypasta that tells the tale of an endless maze of randomly generated office rooms. It is characterized by the smell of wet carpet, walls with a monochromatic tone of yellow, and buzzing fluorescent lights.

*Recomented to listen at Ambience music while playing.
